.Valid Usage (Implicit)
****
* [[VUID-vkGetImageSparseMemoryRequirements-device-parameter]] pname:device must: be a valid sname:VkDevice handle
* [[VUID-vkGetImageSparseMemoryRequirements-image-parameter]] pname:image must: be a valid sname:VkImage handle
* [[VUID-vkGetImageSparseMemoryRequirements-pSparseMemoryRequirementCount-parameter]] pname:pSparseMemoryRequirementCount must: be a valid pointer to a basetype:uint32_t value
* [[VUID-vkGetImageSparseMemoryRequirements-pSparseMemoryRequirements-parameter]] If the value referenced by pname:pSparseMemoryRequirementCount is not `0`, and pname:pSparseMemoryRequirements is not `NULL`, pname:pSparseMemoryRequirements must: be a valid pointer to an array of pname:pSparseMemoryRequirementCount sname:VkSparseImageMemoryRequirements structures
* [[VUID-vkGetImageSparseMemoryRequirements-image-parent]] pname:image must: have been created, allocated, or retrieved from pname:device
****
